summary: An ex marine returns to her hometown after Iraq, honorably kicked out. She helps a 20 y.o. woman, who's otherwise facing prison, prepare for military boot camp.
cast: Dreya Weber|Paris P. Pickard|Anthony Michael Jones|Christine Mourad|Jeff Sugarman|Gregg Daniel|Jason Williams|Deacon Conroy|Brad Light|Lisa Nicole Wolpe|Alice Rietveld|Troy Ruptash|Ned Mochel|Janice Ann Johnson|John Lee Ames|Jane Shepherd|Chance Havens|Kathe Mazur|Sean Hayes|David Avallone|Rick Marques|Cyndi Collucci|Shannon Beach|Christopher Caldwell|Carrie Dobro|Thomas A. Farr|Doug Gochman|Hilary Hayes|Ollie Marland|Jessica M. Bair|Robert James Beddall|Andrew Blau|Amanda Deibert|Colette Divine|Teena Garcia|Kerry Hennessy|Mike McAleer|Tina Tanzer|Tracy Weatherby|Jill Weller
title: A Marine Story
